snippet: Richard Sherman signed a four-year contract extension with the Seattle Seahawks, making him one of the highest-paid cornerbacks in N.F.L. history.
abstract: Richard Sherman signs a four-year contract extension with the Seattle Seahawks, making him one of the highest-paid cornerbacks in NFL history.
lead_paragraph: Richard Sherman signed a four-year contract extension with the Seattle Seahawks, making him one of the highest-paid cornerbacks in N.F.L. history.
